title: Find Your favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (no Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "Find my favorite team" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the "Teams" page in which they have options to select favorite teams by "Select by MLB Affiliate" "Select By MiLB Class" or "View All MiLB Teams."

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects a favorite team from any of these categories
custom_steps_separated.expected: Top favorite team will become the team page on First Pitch.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user exits the app and then re-launches 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user's favorite team should be displayed at the top of 3D menu in place of "Pick my favorite team"

title: MiLB.com News
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (no Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "MiLB.com News" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the "News" page

title: Watch MiLB.TV
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (no Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "Watch MiLB.TV" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the MiLB.TV EPG for the Triple A sportcode.

title: Minor League Scores
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (No Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "Minor League Scores" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the scoreboard page for the sportcode of the class for the favorite team.

title: MiLB.com News(Favorite Team)
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "MiLB.com News" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the "News" page on the sportcode on the class that falls under whichever the user's top favorite team currently is

title: Watch MiLB.TV (Favorite team)
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects "Watch MiLB.tv" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the MiLB.TV EPG for the sportcode that favorite team falls under. Favorite team's game should be the first game on the EPG.

title: Minor League Scores(Favorite team)
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects ""Sportcode of Favorite team" "Scores:" from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought inside First Pitch to the scoreboard for the sportscode that favorite team falls under. Favorite team's game should be atop the scoreboard.

title: Favorite Team Page (Favorite Team)
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed on iPhone 6S
First Pitch non-MiLB.TV logged in (Favorite team)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user presses firmly on First Pitch
when the user selects their favorite team from the 3D logo menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is taken to that team's team page
